      • deleteRequestRCByRequestID

        public int deleteRequestRCByRequestID​(int requestRCID)
        Deletes the request that matches the specified ID, and the related records of the ContainsRelation, FilePDF, Exam (if not used in another request), Report, ValidatedExams objects from the database.
        Specified by:
        deleteRequestRCByRequestID in interface RequestRCDAOInterface
        Parameters:
        requestRCID - the ID of the RequestRC object that will be deleted.
        Returns:
        • a positive value if the deletion succeeded
        • 0 if the request wasn't deleted
        • -1 if the deletion succeeded, but the database didn't return any information about the number of deleted rows
        • -2 if the passed parameter is not a valid RequestRC ID

      • deleteRequestRCByStudentID

        public int deleteRequestRCByStudentID​(java.lang.String studentMail)
        Deletes the request that matches the specified student ID, and the related records of the ContainsRelation, FilePDF, Exam (if not used in another request), Report, ValidatedExams objects from the database.
        Specified by:
        deleteRequestRCByStudentID in interface RequestRCDAOInterface
        Parameters:
        studentMail - the ID of the Student object that the RequestRC must match.
        Returns:
        • a positive value if the deletion succeeded
        • 0 if the request wasn't deleted
        • -1 if the deletion succeeded, but the database didn't return any information about the number of deleted rows
        • -2 if the passed parameter is not a valid Student ID
